scripts.build: npm run makeBuildFolder && npm run makeFontFolder && npm run buildView1 && npm run buildView2 && npm run buildView3 && npm run replace && npm run minifyJS  && npm run buildCSS && npm run copyImages && npm run copyIndex && npm run buildFont && npm run copyImages
scripts.replace: replace 'app/views' 'views' dist/login.js && replace 'app/views' 'views' dist/stories.js && replace 'app/views' 'views' dist/admin.js
scripts.buildJS: npm run copyApp && uglifyjs app/bower_components/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js app/bower_components/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js app/bower_components/angular/angular.min.js app/bower_components/angular-route/angular-route.min.js app/bower_components/angular-deckgrid/angular-deckgrid.js app/bower_components/angular-bootstrap/ui-bootstrap.min.js dist/app.js app/views/login/*.js app/views/stories/*.js app/views/admin/*.js dist/login.js dist/stories.js dist/admin.js --screw-ie8 -b -o dist/bundle.js
scripts.buildCSS: cleancss --output dist/bundle.css app/bower_components/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css app/bower_components/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css app/*.css app/views/login/login.css app/views/stories/stories.css app/app.css
scripts.buildFont: npm run makeFontFolder && npm run copyFAFont && npm run copyBSFont && npm run replaceFAFontRef && npm run replaceBSFontRef
